means: 实际上，实质上，事实上，几乎

sentence.Network_en: This show, too, was virtually sold out before it opened.
sentence.Network_cn: 这场演出的门票也是几乎在开演前就销售一空了。

sentence.Network_en: Valentino was virtually deified by legions of female fans.
sentence.Network_cn: 瓦伦蒂诺几乎被众多的女性崇拜者奉若神明。

sentence.Network_en: In less than two hours Cohen capitulated to virtually every demand.
sentence.Network_cn: 还不到两个小时，科恩就屈服了，接受了几乎一切要求。

list.abs: 虚拟现实（Virtual reality）与模拟现实（Simulated reality），一字之差，很容易引起混淆。 不少人把虚拟现实与模拟现实混为一谈。
考研英语结合实际美词一览 -考研英语 ... e-commerce( 电子商务) virtual life( 虚拟生活) information era( 信息时代).
虚拟内存（Virtual Memory） 是指计算机呈现出要比实际拥有的内存大得多的内存量。因此它允许程序员编制并运行比实际系统拥有 …
虚拟机（Virtual Machine）指通过软件模拟的具有完整硬件系统功能的、运行在一个完全隔离环境中的完整计算机系统。目录定义虚 …

means.word_mean: 几乎,差不多,实质上,接近,几乎不

entry.tran: 几乎;实际上;事实上;差不多
entry.def: You can use virtually to indicate that something is so nearly true that for most purposes it can be regarded as true.

example.ex: Virtually all cooking was done over coal-fired ranges...
example.tran: 差不多所有的烹饪都是在燃煤灶上进行的。

example.ex: It would have been virtually impossible to research all the information.
example.tran: 要对所有的信息进行分析研究几乎是不可能的。

means.word_mean: 1. (intensifier before a figurative expression) without exaggeration;

sentences.sentence: "our eyes were literally pinned to TV during the Gulf war"

means.word_mean: 2. in essence or effect but not in fact;
3. (of actions or states) slightly short of or not quite accomplished; `near' is sometimes used informally for `nearly' and `most' is sometimes used informally for `almost';

sentences.sentence: "the baby was almost asleep when the alarm sounded"
"the car all but ran her down"
"virtually all the parties signed the contract"
"I was near exhausted by the run"

auth_sentence.content: Woodwind instruments are common to virtually all musical cultures.
auth_sentence.res_content: Woodwind instruments are common to virtually all musical cultures.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Woodwind instruments are common to virtually all musical cultures.

auth_sentence.content: You can virtually name your team for Rio now.
auth_sentence.res_content: You can virtually name your team for Rio now.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You can virtually name your team for Rio now.

auth_sentence.content: I think that that would cover virtually every case.
auth_sentence.res_content: I think that that would cover virtually every case.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I think that that would cover virtually every case.

Sentence.sentence: They are virtually impossible to enforce.
In the early 20th century Americans believed science and technology could solve virtually all existing problems.

sentences.en: The job was virtually completed by the end of the week.
sentences.cn: 到周末时这项工作差不多完成了。

jushi.english: The job was virtually completed by the end of the week.
jushi.chinese: 到周末时这项工作差不多完成了。
